content:
# We successfully harvested 10 more iron ore, bringing our inventory to:
# - 8 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 10 iron ore
# 
# The furnace still has 13 coal remaining but is showing "NO_INGREDIENTS" due to having no iron ore previously available for smelting. 

# Now that we have iron ore in our inventory, let's insert it back into the furnace to resume the smelting process.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert the iron ore into the furnace

# Check the furnace status and inventory after this insertion
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
print(f"Furnace Inventory after adding iron ore: {furnace_inventory}")
print(f"Furnace Status after adding iron ore: {furnace.status}")  # Check status again

# Since iron ore is now back in the furnace, I will wait again to see if more iron plates are produced.
for _ in range(30):  # Wait for up to 30 seconds
    furnace_inv = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inv[Prototype.IronPlate] > 14:  # Check if any additional iron plates have been produced
        break
    sleep(1)

print(f"Final Inventory after smelting again: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
